programme.title: The Rise of Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: S1:E2 Frank Shamrock was one of the toughest fighters to ever compete in the UFC. He holds the world record for the fastest consecutive knockouts, but his biggest fight happened when he was a child, living with his stepfather. His stepfather emotionally abused him so devastatingly, that even when Frank was sent to a Juvenile Detention Center, the other kids couldn’t believe what he went through. While many kids would be crushed under such pain and suffering, Frank Shamrock was determined to prove why warriors always find a way to win.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: Nicole Kidman vs. Tom Cruise
programme.desc: S1:E9 Was Scientology the reason why Tom Cruise divorced Nicole Kidman? Nicole was obsessed with Tom. She tried to do everything she could to be with the superstar at all times. But Tom had another obsession: Scientology. Then, when Tom Cruise suddenly divorced Nicole, the world she thought she was living in shattered into a million pieces. Was it because of Scientology? Was it the multiple miscarriages she had? Was it the wiretap Tom allegedly put on Nicole? This story was so uncovered, that our team had to dig deep to get the details.

programme.title: Amber Rose vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E5 it true that Kanye West was harassing Amber Rose when she suddenly left him? When Kanye West started dating Amber Rose, he took her from the life of being a stripper to the global superstar world. At first, they seemed like a couple that was truly in love. But when Amber suddenly left Kanye, his attitude towards her completely changed. Our team uncovered the real story behind the tabloids of the years of bullying, unwanted media attention, and attacks that Amber had to suffer. The true story will reveal why she was the special woman Kanye fell in love with in the first place, and what she and Kim Kardashian have in common.

programme.title: Katy Perry vs. Russell Brand
programme.desc: S1:E7 Katy Perry is no stranger to toxic relationships. She finally thought she landed the perfect one with bad boy comedian Russell Brand, only for him to divorce her through text message right in the middle of her world tour 2 years later. Our team uncovered the full story of the turbulent aftermath and the journey she went on to become a strong, authentic person who was finally able to fully embrace a healthy relationship.

programme.title: Drake Vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E16 Drake went from hip hop hero to deadbeat dad when Kanye West collaborator Pusha T revealed Drake was hiding a secret son, but why was he hiding his son in the first place? And how did Pusha know about it?Everybody assumed Kanye had leaked the information because he was threatened by Drake’s success, but the truth is way more complicated.After digging into Drake and Kanye’s feud and friendship, our team discovered the real story behind Drake’s secret son and the journey he went on to embrace fatherhood for himself.

programme.title: Justin Bieber Vs. Hailey Bieber
programme.desc: S2:E7 Justin and Hailey Bieber are at the height of their careers. So why do they keep getting sick? Our team uncovers this isn’t the first time one of Justin’s love interests has had a life-threatening illness. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Selena Gomez with Hailey?

programme.title: Find Your Way Back
programme.desc: Lisa Nichols delivers a powerful speech on how she struggled with abuse and depression and what these experiences taught her, and shares the best actionable advice on how to overcome even your most troubling times.

programme.title: Embrace the Suck
programme.desc: Navy SEAL veteran David Goggins shares how he overcame so many debilitating obstacles to later achieve incredible military and personal honors, and the mentality that kept him going and made him push beyond his limits.

programme.title: Integrity or Nothing
programme.desc: This is how the worlds biggest music manager, Scooter Braun, climbed out of his rock-bottom to make it to the top. What started as sweat, tears and hustle blossomed into a life of generosity and compassion, all because of one important piece of wisdom from his father.

programme.title: The Boy with the Broken Brain
programme.desc: Jim Kwik went from learning-challenged to becoming a world expert in speed-reading and memory improvement. A leading authority on learning, Jim has trained everyone from Fortune 500 CEOs like Elon Musk to Hollywood superstars, Will Smith and Hugh Jackman. If knowledge is power, then learning is your superpower, and Jim shows you how to find it.

programme.title: 10x Your Life
programme.desc: Author, entrepreneur, and sales savant, Grant Cardone, breaks down the power of his 10X Rule and how you can use it to multiply your success.

programme.title: Find Your Talent

programme.title: How Companies Cheated Price Fixing Laws
programme.desc: "Algorithms are everywhere. Every app, every website, EVERY business you interact with has a program working away in the background to show you what you want to see, get you to make decisions you didn’t have to, and make you spend as much as you’re absolutely willing to on stuff you didn’t know you needed…"

programme.title: The Bankruptcy Boom & The Golden Age of Fraud
programme.desc: 2023 is going to finish up as the worst year for corporate bankruptcies since the end of the Global Financial Crisis. This year has also claimed the two biggest bankruptcies in American history that didn’t occur during the GFC and if that’s got you feeling nervous, don’t worry, according to the numbers 2024 is going to be much worse. According to data from Standard & Poor’s, corporate bankruptcies in the major companies they track were up over 200 in the first half of 2023. High profile companies like wework, Vice Media and Bed Bath and Beyond all went under due to a combination of poor management, changing consumer preferences, high interest rates and bad market conditions. But what does this even mean? Even though these companies went bankrupt Vice is still making videos, you can still rent a office from WeWork, and Bed Bath and Beyond is still selling overpriced laundry hampers. Bankruptcies just aren’t what they used to be anymore and now instead of being the corporate equivalent of game over, it’s just another business strategy, which is just one of four reasons why it’s become so popular. Now you all know I hate videos from supposed experts with wide open mouths peddling some doomer, but the other three reasons why bankruptcies are on the rise are honestly worrying and they also show why business leaders just don’t take it seriously anymore. The first reason that bankruptcies are booming is because of a new investing strategy that rewards taking on as much risk as possible. Private equity is a broad classification of investing that just means putting money into companies that are not publicly listed on any securities exchange. Venture capitalists who invest in early startups are a type of private equity, all of the deals you watch get made on shark tank are private equity deals… if you give your family member a few thousand dollars to get their Etsy store going in exchange for a cut of their future profits you are technically a private equity investor, so make sure to slap that on your LinkedIn profile. Bu

programme.title: Most People Think They Are Middle Class (Most Are Not)
programme.desc: "Most people think they are middle class, but most are not, and thats costing them a lot of money. This society wide problem is made worse because nobody knows what middle class even means anymore You probably think middle class is what MOST people think is middle class. Not rich, but not poor. A middle-class family can afford a regular home with a thirty-year mortgage, two cars, and a holiday once a year. A middle-class family has two people that work in middle management or run a small business. If they are lucky, you might imagine that one of the pair could stay home to look after children. The middle class describes the largest share of people on the wealth spectrum slotted between the extremely wealthy, and the working class. But you would find it impossible to give a net worth figure that is the cut-off for entry into any of these classes. There are three reasons why you are not middle class and FOUR reasons why this irrelevant definition is hurting your real financial situation. The first reason you are not middle class is because that term really doesnt mean anything anymore. The middle class was first used in early modern Europe to describe the middling people that were not nobility but not peasants either, they were wealthy merchants or factory owners. If you dont own a factory or a fleet of trade ships you already fall outside the original definition of the middle class. Today these people would be considered upper class, especially in America where we rejected the idea of nobility. The middle class is a changing classification, and that change is usually decided by the upper class. In early modern Europe the nobles needed a way to class people that were as wealthy as they were, but not considered as important. Today the middle class describes people that arent nearly as rich as the new upper class, which is the old middle class, but also arent poor. Its a definition so broad its practically useless, but it has still changed a lot in a short span of time. Homer Simpson was once portrayed as a working-c

programme.title: "Why Most People Are Actually ""Too Good"" For Their Job"
programme.desc: "This is a problem because no matter how you put it, a job where you sit in an air-conditioned office making six figures a year in your first year out of college is way more desirable than doing roadwork in Arizona for 20 bucks an hour. The problem is that everybody is trying really hard to pretend this isn’t true, and the system that has sprung up to maintain this dream has caused more problems than you realize."

programme.desc: Es el informativo estelar del canal, con las últimas noticias del acontecer político, social, deportivo y cultural de China y el resto del mundo. Los hechos que constituyen titulares están aquí, en CGTN Noticias.

programme.title: PRISMA
programme.desc: Prisma es un programa cultural producido por CGTN en español en colaboración con el multimedio de comunicación latinoamericano teleSUR. Su objetivo es mostrar a los televidentes la riqueza cultural de China y el mundo hispanohablante, elevar el conocimiento de la cultura china en los países de habla hispana y establecer una plataforma de diálogo entre ambas partes. Se trata de un programa mensual de 30 minutos de duración que comenzó a emitirse en agosto de 2016. Está compuesto de tres segmentos que destacan por su diversidad temática. Primero, un espacio de noticias culturales; después, una semblanza de alguna personalidad del ámbito cultural latinoamericano; y finalmente un documental sobre aspectos de la cultura china.

One For The Road
programme.desc: Join TGR's all-star athlete team as they travel the globe in search of deep snow, steep lines, and gnarly cliffs and couloirs on which to push the limits of skiing and snowboarding.

programme.title: Legacy - Surfing Now & Then
programme.desc: As the sport grows, more and more people surf. Do the surfing legends still relate to what pro surfing has become? Will surfing be as mainstream as other sports? Can you teach the Aloha Spirit to mainlanders and surfers from new demographics? Meet the surfing pioneers while they compete for a World Title in the Azores islands and get to know their views on what is still to come.

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks along the Jacques Cartier River before heading to Québec City to explore the cobblestone streets and old buildings the UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for.

programme.title: Best of Untracked
programme.desc: Tag along with a number of Teton Gravity Research crews as they travel the world in search of the new and unknown throughout three seasons of Untracked, hitting all of the show's highlights.

programme.title: The Big One HD
programme.desc: The Big One celebrates a decade spent at and around Jackson Hole Mountain Resort, arguably the best ski resort in the world. Check out the highlights from years hammering "The Village."

programme.title: Kayaking in the Laurentian Mountains
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he heads to the adventure-filled region of Québec that gets its' name from a chain of mountains the runs through it—the Laurentians. Join Ken as he explores the islands of Lac Poisson Blanc by sea kayak before putting his whitewater kayaking skills to the test on one of Eastern Canada's most popular rivers, the Rouge River.

programme.title: The Bay Of Fundy: A Kayaking Adventure In Nova Scotia
programme.desc: Humpback whales inches from your kayak or multiple beat downs at the Walton ‘Wopper’ – these are some of the contrasting experiences captured on camera in Nova Scotia’s Bay of Fundy. Join top sea kayakers taking on the world’s largest tidal range; carving it up in the chocolately rapids of the Shubie river and seeing how long they can hold their breath in the meaty hole at Walton. Local paddler Chris Lockyer hosts Justine Curgenven and a crew of international sea kayaking talent.

programme.title: Rise Of Red
programme.desc: Join Tim Durtschi, Colter Hinchliffe, and Red, their Ford Ranger, as they travel across the West in search of late-season powder and adventure. It's a road trip unlike any other.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Motovation Supersport
programme.desc: Race 2 in Supersport kept the action alive with high-speed duels and late-race drama. The podium wasn‚Äôt settled until the final laps

programme.title: FIM QuadX EMX European Championship
programme.desc: The racers are all now looking forward to the penultimate round of the 2024 EMX Quadcross Championship

programme.title: F4 Championship: Saudi Arabia
programme.desc: The 2024 Formula 4 Saudi Arabian Championship is the first season of the championship. The championship is a 6-event, 24-race series that will visit Bahrain, Kuwait, Qatar, and Saudi Arabia.

programme.title: P1 Class One Powerboats
programme.desc: Class 1 is the premier class of offshore powerboat racing in the world and is considered to be one of the most spectacular marine motorsports.

programme.title: Peterson Automotive Museum Global Garages
programme.desc: Tim Allen shares his private garage containing a diverse car collection of hot rods, customs, sports cars, and even a Tesla! Some celebrity garages only have new cars, but Tim is a genuine hot rodder and enjoys building cars and driving fast.

programme.title: British Mini Bikes
programme.desc: British Mini Bikes has grown into Britains biggest and best championship for racing all forms of Mini bikes on tarmac surfaces.

programme.title: MotoAmerica Presents: Pressure to Rise
programme.desc: Finding success in the MotoAmerica professional motorcycle road racing series takes talent, teamwork, steadfast determination, and a little bit of luck.

programme.title: Quilt Basics
programme.desc: Get started with the basics for traditional quilting. What could be more basic than quilting for home decor and apparel? Rebecca Kemp Brent has a demonstration on free motion and guided quilting to hold a kaleidoscope applique in place, plus a short discussion on fusibles and needles. Then, Angela Wolf demonstrates ruching with elastic thread.

programme.title: Trends
programme.desc: The first episode is all about the trends. Angela Wolf introduces our trendy top, perfect for every occasion, size and style – sew along with eight different lessons this season on a specific element of the top. Then it’s a trending accessory and a cross body bag with Kay Whitt. Finally meet Ebony Love for our first quilt block – stay tuned over the season for five different blocks AND five unique projects utilizing your starter block.

programme.title: Heirloom Cabochons
programme.desc: Using colorful fabric, blogger Mandi Ainsworth fashions cabochons to create heirlooms using a new twist on traditional techniques. Mandi makes a bezel with seed beads to create timeless pendants, bracelets and necklaces. Katie shows how to tie knots in leather strips to create a fashion-forward necklace.

programme.title: Wire as the Artists' Muse
programme.desc: Inspiration can come from a style, an artist, or the material itself. Today's artists get their creative jump start from wire. Our feature bead type is lamp work beads and soft glass vs borosilicate. Then, artist Brenda Schweder is back with a Calder inspired modern, wire art necklace. Then, inventor Wyatt White takes wire weaving to a new level making an intricate bangle.

programme.title: Details
programme.desc: Adding new details keeps things fresh. Christine Drumheller adds texture as she designs with thread using the sewing machine. Amy Tan sprays and spatters paint for special effects. Julie Fei-Fan Balzer wraps it all up with a review of the fresh new techniques featured throughout the series.

programme.title: Time Travels
programme.desc: The theme for this episode is traveling back in time, as we are inspired by history. First host Julie Fei Fan Balzer creates a landscape viewed through antique glass. It's a unique perspective fueled by a photo. Then Michael deMeng has a Day of the Dead inspired project using figurines. Last, we join Cat Kerr for a crown reminiscent of medieval times but perfect for your favorite princess today

programme.desc: Learn to knit with CraftsyTV.

programme.title: Bargello Beauty Rainbow Quilt
programme.desc: Can’t get enough of bargello? Angela Walters shows you how to make a ravishing rainbow quilt using precut fabric strip sets.

programme.title: Letters from Mom
programme.desc: Uri's father gives him letters written by his deceased mother when he was POW. Reading the letters in a cemetery, Uri meets Iris. Dr. Haim visits Nimrode, who reveals details he had not. Nimrod plays football with journalists and has anxiety attack.

programme.title: Musical Adaptations
programme.desc: Few jobs are harder than adapting a musical from stage to screen. For every hit like West Side Story, there?s a miss like Rock of Ages. Our hosts look at the best and worst adaptations, including Cabaret, Chicago, and Fiddler on the Roof.

programme.title: Daily News from Israel
programme.desc: A daily English-language newscast direct from the State of Israel

programme.title: Hannah Prays for a Son
programme.desc: Elkana has two wives - Peninah, who has children and Hannah, who is barren. They come to sacrifice at the Mishkan in Shiloh. Hannah is feeling left out not having children of her own. She leaves the camp and goes to pray at the Mishkan.

programme.title: Establishment of Beersheba
programme.desc: Abraham, now secure in his camp, plants a shade tree and sets up a kind of roadside inn where he host travelers to teach them about his G-d.

programme.title: Looking Into The Eyes of Resistance
programme.desc: The stories of two Polish Jews who fought as Partisans against the Nazis and ultimately married after WW II. Produced by 15-year-old filmmaker, Paul Love, who wanted his generation to learn the Barans' story and never to forget the Holocaust.

programme.title: None
programme.desc: Capturing the can-do spirit of a community tested by adversity, this moving look at the COVID-19 pandemic tells how Jewish Atlanta responded with unprecedented charity and creativity, with optimism and resiliency even during the darkest days.

programme.title: MAC DADDY & THE LOVERS
programme.desc: Mac Giani (Mac Jay) is a notorious ladies man who takes pleasure in seducing women and making them fall in love. He becomes a legend in the town and is well-skilled in breaking hearts. His skills earn the respect of two friends, who experience the hardships of falling in and out of love and become jaded about finding true love. In a twist of fate, their teacher becomes the student, as Mac unexpectedly falls in love and must confront his dark past to save his dismal future.

programme.title: BIRTHDAY
programme.desc: Ms trade is sex, but sex doesnt sell the way it used to; what clients are searchingis love. M is the highest-paid professional of the many girls at Scarlets, but even on her 25th Birthday, its business as usual. Instead of celebrating, her day is spent answering the silent prayers of Father Phillip. He has lost faith in providing counsel to her colleagues, the vivacious Lily and troubled Cindy. Amidst the many dramas that unfold and the demands of the no-nonsenseScarlet, Ms secret birthday wish goes unanswered, that is, until Joey knocks on her door; a young man, forgotten by the world, who has never learned to love or even how to kiss. But Joey also has a secret, its his Birthday too, and today M might discover that even the slightest, most unexpected wish can come true. Birthday encompasBirthday love, first times, humanity, and the discovery of intimacy in surprising and unexpected places.

programme.title: CROSSING BRIDGE

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 38
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Star to Star
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: SPACE INVADER
programme.desc: Krackleflint is back with the latest and greatest diabolical offering from Krackleflint Industries Inc.

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: The Race
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Mechanical Mayhem
programme.desc: Victor is tired of the Creepy CandyTM causing trouble and messing up his experiments. He creates a robot, The Sweet Tooth Terrorator, to teach the mischievous little candy a lesson once and for all! Watch as the Creepy Candy TM come up with crazy plans to defend themselves against the giant robot! Can they defeat the robot, or will Victor finally be rid of the Creepy Candy TM? Finally, who is going to clean up the mess?

programme.title: Stone Soup
programme.desc: WI-Go the traveler is starving and has nothing but his brain. He ends up making the most delicious soup in the world using a mysterious stone without using a single penny.

programme.title: Runaway Custard
programme.desc: Tiggy is busy making custard and Deedee and Nino are helping out. But Mayor De Pfeffle cannot seem to understand what happened to his purple custard freshly sent over by Nino. So Mewmew offers to help while taking eggs over to Tiggy’s. But the carton turns out to only have one egg, and Tiggy needs to make eight more jars of purple custard. The answer seems to lie in Deedee’s magic spell that makes one purple custard jar never run out of purple custard for the entire day. And it works like a charm, non-stop purple custard. The Mayor gets a half eaten jar of purple custard and keeps it safe for after, only to have it finished by the Doobydoos. As the Mayor turns up at Tiggy’s once more for more purple custard, he rushes off with the jar that the spell has been cast on. A happy Mayor gets Mewmew to stay guard of the jar while he is out, and Mewmew catches the Doobydoos red handed trying to eat the custard. But the jar tips over in the confusion and unknown to Mewmew the loyal custard guard, the bottle keeps on flowing till it reaches the ground floor. Deedee is called in urgency and only Nino can fly up the building and put the jar right up again. Having done that they call all the townsfolk to come to town hall to eat up as much purple custard as they can. All join in and have a hearty treat, so much so that they cannot have a bite more. Finally Mayor De Pfeffle arrives and is happy to share his purple custard with everyone, but much to his surprise no one wants any. Wonder why?

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Gummys Little Pet.
programme.desc: Gummy gets a small pet fish with a HUGE appetite – and he, Harry and Kala soon find that feeding this ever-ravenous, ever-growing pet is pretty much a full-time job!

programme.title: BASHAS BANDANA
programme.desc: Basha has washed his bandana and has put it for drying. He is taking an afternoon nap when the bandana flies and reaches Sundar. Basha wakes up and is shocked to see his bandana gone. His is so not comfortable getting out without his signature bandana. He quickly makes a bandana with leaves and gets out in search of his missing bandana. To his utter horror he sees that Sundar has found it. For once, the roles have changed in Hotel Kelifornia and now Basha is running after Sundar for his dear bandana. Sundar is absolutely enjoying this attention and is making Basha do all sorts of funny things in exchange of the bandana. He even gets Basha to put up a show for the customers. But in the middle of a crazy chase, the bandana reaches back in Bashas hands. Back to his style, Basha is all geared up to tell Sundar who the boss is! Oh boy!

programme.title: Where is it?
programme.desc: During a game of hide and seek Deedee and Nino come across a panicky Mewmew who cannot locate his key. Deedee creates a spell to get back all of Mewmew’s missing things and in come his key, including his long lost bubble-cordion and pocket fork. But Mewmew doesn’t want those things back as he had already replaced them. So Deedee offers to keep them as she couldn’t stand the sight of them being thrown away. On the way they find Charlie hiding from his lost but newly found alarm clock that is chasing him. The clock won’t let Charlie sleep a bit by ringing all the time, so Deedee offers to take it along with the rest. Deedee gets many more additions to her lost and found group as many more citizens of Abra-Dabra are affected with lost things. But as Deedee doesn’t have any space to store them, she puts up a give-away store. Now everyone’s happy.

programme.title: Mangorush
programme.desc: Hurray!! It is mango season and Don is ready to fill his belly. But lary marly and charly are all set for the loot. With mangoes and grenades all around, they all get what they deserv

programme.title: Check Out Yuk
programme.desc: When Yuk accidentally gets stuck in a book and the book gets checked out of the library, he comes face to face with the dangers of being out in the real world.Will he survive all the twists and turns his journey takes him on? Will he ever make it back to the library in one piece? Will Icky and Yicky have to continue on as a duo? Watch the crazy shenanigans in the episode Yuk Checks Out!

programme.title: PET PEEVES
programme.desc: April tries for Xia’s attention, but he’s too busy doting on his new pet bird, Peachy Woo. Pai loves his new pet fish, Noodle. April suspects Peachy Woo of being the mutant the Elders have warned the Guardians about, but it turns out to be…Noodle!

programme.title: Perfect Scoop
programme.desc: Biggs tampers with Nardys newest invention, an ice cream making robot. Will Nardy be able to stop him before all of Smightyland is covered in frozen treats?

programme.title: Low Memory
programme.desc: Sneevil gets amnesia and the Smighties take him on a camping adventure. They have a great time with him until he gets his memory back!

programme.title: Good Luck, Bad Luck
programme.desc: The lucky amulet April has bought arrives in the mail. Pai and Xia make fun of her – until they see that April is suddenly top in every discipline. First Pai and then Xia steals her amulet, and whoever has it wins at everything. They are arguing over who should keep the amulet, when Maestro Woof reveals it wasn’t the amulet April bought at all. It was a pumice stone that he had ordered. The Guardians realize that good luck doesn’t depend on outside factors but comes from inside themselves.

programme.title: BIG BALL OF PUPA
programme.desc: The ninjas investigate the strange phenomenon of objects disappearing from Peelville streets while Seb deals with a fear of bugs.

programme.title: Chill Out
programme.desc: A hot summer afternoon. The fan has stopped working and the ice trays are empty, and who could be responsible for putting Don through all this sweat! Mottu Lambu and Chottu giggle as they watch Don spinning along with the fan, getting frozen inside a locked deep freezer. Colonel is all set to rescue Don, but will he succeed?

programme.title: Treasure Map Adventure
programme.desc: The Super Six and Sneevil race to find a hidden treasure over land and sea, facing obstacles along the way. When they enter the Smightymuda Triangle, things get even rockier and wild. Who will make it out and find the treasure first?

programme.title: PAI PROBLEM
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Magic Fort overnight. Negu sends a mutant that’s a clone of Pai. Pai has to defeat himself using his own self-knowledge.

programme.title: SPICED UP
programme.desc: It is a regular day at Hotel Kelifornia. But things change when a political convoy breaks down just in front of the hotel and the politician with his chelas come into the hotel. Chai Raja is super-excited to have VIP guest. To serve his the best of his tea, Chai Raja opens a special shelf and takes out a very specially protected rack. It is a small herbarium filled with the most exoctic tea saplings...sure to make Chai Rajas brews that much more irresistible. Sundar is assigned the responsibility of taking care of the saplings...but Basha has to stick his monkey-snout into the affairs so that Sundar would be too caught up trying to keep the exotic saplings safe from harm and would be distracted from the snack shelf which is Bashastarget.. Now Basha has two distractions to mess with and make Sundars life more miserable. Sundar stumbles, fumbles and lurches through service till his clashes with Basha ends in Sundar landing the herbarium on the VIP guest. Everything in the shop reaches the VIP guest, except for the tea. He is beaten, bruised and infuriated. And when he couldnt take it anymore and he is about to get out, poor Sundar somehow gets the tea to him. Raged beyond words, he sips the special tea.. It is heaven!!! He loves itttt. He thanks Chai Raja, and leaves the teashop a happy man (yet bruised and limping). Sundar is ecstatic. And Basha is flummoxed!

programme.title: BULL-DOZER
programme.desc: It is harvest festival and the backyard of Hotel Kelifornia is transformed into a muddy field.Basha and Sundar are the usual chasing self. The duo soon finds that it is bull racing competition happening in the backyard makeshift field. Basha in all his style is ready to participate. Chai Raja is very excited to see a buzzing crowd around his hotel which means good business. Sundar who get busy with serving and excited about the racing gets a jealous competitive streak when he sees Basha. Sundar sneaks out and is ready to race. The third participant is a lanky frail kid with two thinner bulls. The race is on. And Basha and Sundar soon gets into chasing each other messing each others racing and everything around them. It is a hilarious spectacle for the crowd and a horrifying experience for Chai Raja. And race ends with a thoroughly beaten Basha and Sundar losing to the lanky kid who still cant believe that he won since he and the skinny bulls just walked through the race. The story ends with Chai Raja putting both Sundar and Basha to clean up the whole mess they created.

programme.title: ATHITHI DEVO BHAVA
programme.desc: Chai Raja has taught Sundar a valuable lesson that customers are like god. Cashing on this opportunity Basha walks into the hotel pretending to be a customer. Basha comes into the shop in all kind of disguises dressed like a pot-bellied Carnatic singer soon caught by Sundar, as a suited up officer soon caught by Sundar and at last as a sadhu making Sundar do all sorts of silly and insane chores/services. At last when the customer asks Sundar to massage his limbs, Sundar finds a peculiar fifth leg (Bashas tail) which makes Sundar lose all control and he goes mad. It is sheer madness in the teashop.

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: Katreena the Cat
programme.desc: There’s a new hot kitten called katreena ,’Kitty’ in short, has just come visiting her friend Dunky. She is so hot that Cat will do anything to just be with her.

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: A Packet of Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy, Kala and Harry get caught up in an escalating competition to get the whole collection of cereal box ‘free surprises’ – with each of them only missing the super-rare little plastic unicorn.

programme.title: April’s Rain
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to tidy up their island. Negu seizes the chance to send his Dust Mutant to make the island even dirtier. Pai and Xia ask April to make it rain and clean everything effortlessly. But April hasn’t yet mastered this power, and accidentally creates a tornado. Fortunately it defeats the Dust Monster… but unfortunately, it leaves a total mess, and they still have to tidy up.

programme.title: LOCKED UP
programme.desc: After his Mutant Octopus is defeated, Negu decides to attack the Guardians himself with a Mutant Meerkat. The Guardians capture him, and the Elders have Negu locked up near the Magic Fort. The Mutant Meerkat tunnels into the fort so Negu can steal the Glove of the North – his plan all along. The Guardians rush to stop him, but Negu ties them up with his Lasso of Doom – until Pai gnaws through it and temporarily EATS the Glove of the North!

programme.title: THAT SINKING FEELING
programme.desc: Mei decides to impress Negu with an art museum. He has the Rock-Eating Mutant pull down old buildings to build the museum. The Guardians’ “island” starts to sink. Pai “fishes” for the cause of the sinking and pulls up the Mutant, whom they entice to eat something besides rocks.

programme.title: ICE ATTACK
programme.desc: The Elders confiscate the Guardians’ weapons until they learn to value each other. Negu sends Ice Poppy, a cute mutant who can shoot ice and freeze you if you look in her eyes. Valuing each other, the Guardians defeat Ice Poppy and earn their weapons back.

programme.title: FIRE AWAY!
programme.desc: On a chilly morning, Xia tries to heat things up with his Golden Katana, but keeps accidentally setting fires. He does no better as the Dragon Warrior. When Negu sends a mutant Heat Monster, the Guardians will have to fight fire with fire…or possibly water.

programme.title: Camping Trip
programme.desc: In a multi-coloured SUV, Don and Colonel with their bagpacks zipped are set for a camping trip. Watch them in close contact with nature and “trouble”.

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: The Secrets of the Engine
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: OH, RATS!
programme.desc: It’s quiet…TOO quiet, according to Pai, who’s convinced Negu’s about to attack. Pai prepares a trap. But the evil lord of the Chou World is depressed by all his failures. Mei decides to launch an attack himself. He can only get one mutant rat to follow him…who in turn is followed by lots of fellow mutant rats. The Guardians laugh at Mei and his rats, but the rats have a secret weapon: horrible, high-pitched SCREAMS! Pai knits earmuffs for himself, April, and Xia, then lures the rats onto his trap with cheese. In the end, Pai savors the silence.

programme.title: No rain, no gain
programme.desc: The twins meet Imelda, a very anxious lizard. Because she can see a small cloud in the blue sky, Imelda is preparing to face a hurricane. Perhaps you can think positive and consider that a bit of rain is good for someone else.

programme.title: Gummy’s Little Pet.
programme.desc: Gummy gets a small pet fish with a HUGE appetite – and he, Harry and Kala soon find that feeding this ever-ravenous, ever-growing pet is pretty much a full-time job!

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Cat notices that Katreena is a big fan of “macho man” a well built super star .He needs to build his physique and impress her.

programme.title: BIG BALL OF PUPA
programme.desc: The ninjas investigate the strange phenomenon of objects disappearing from Peelville streets while Seb deals with a fear of bugs.

programme.title: I'm fine!
programme.desc: The twins encounter in the woods an owl who can’t see very well, but won’t admit it. Until the twins give him a strange pair of glasses.

programme.title: Honor Code
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: Distemper Tantrum
programme.desc: Maple has difficulty learning to float in the Zooniverse. Be persistent and you can learn to stay calm by thinking happy thoughts.

programme.title: A Question Of Smell – Jack & The Beanstalk
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the tale of “Jack and the Beanstalk”, having been called out by Jack’s mother. Her son climbed up a giant beanstalk going from the garden up into the clouds, and has not returned. The fairytale detective and her assistant set off on the tracks of the missing boy and climb up into the strange world of the giants, above the clouds. There, they will pull off a great escape full of surprises, risks and adventures

programme.title: Shrunken Jam
programme.desc: Don is baking a cake.In an apron.Puts the batter in a container the oven.Turns on the KNOB.And then... when he opens the oven door, the cake is missing. He cranes his neck and sees that there is a hole on the back of the oven! That is it, Charly Marly and Lary will pay for this!

programme.title: Cruise Blues
programme.desc: On the deck of the cruise, Titanic-style Don and Colonel stand facing the sea, enjoying the breeze until the shark leaps up in the air. Where ever Don is, Charly Lary and Marly are sure to follow. Watch them battle sharks and take on the sea!

programme.title: Paint Job
programme.desc: It is makeover time. Paint, brushes, brooms and rollers, they have it all. But the mice want the walls in a shade of red, and Don and Colonel have decided that it has to be blue. To solve the confusion, Colonel cements the mice’s house shut. What would the mice do in return?

programme.title: The Supreme Law – Simbad
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, the elf Fo, travel into the story of Sinbad the Sailor, having been called out by PRINCESS ARIBA, the daughter of the GRAND CALIPH. There, they learn that the intrepid sailor has been arrested by the VIZIER, accused of having broken a supreme law: lying to the Grand Caliph, when recounted the stories of his incredible voyages to him. Unless someone does something, SINBAD will be executed in 12 hours’ time. SANDRA and FO must find irrefutable proof that the wonders described by SINBAD are true, while at the same time escaping from the claws of the evil VIZIER.

programme.title: Honey Shampoo – Goldilocks
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of Goldilocks, having been called out by her MOTHER. GOLDILOCKS has run away from home after a tremendous tantrum. The detective is optimistic, sure that this will be one of the easiest cases in her career. After all, the story of Goldilocks is an innocent tale in which nothing very much happens. Nothing could be further from the truth. It turns out that GOLDILOCKS is a devilishly difficult little girl, who gets the experienced detective and her long-suffering assistant into a series of perilous - and amusing - scrapes.

programme.title: San Juan Night
programme.desc: To get some alone time with the beautiful Nora, Fred must jump through multiple hoops, including saving the town’s history book from a fire.

programme.title: Oh It's So Noisy!
programme.desc: Tomorrow is Scots birthday and hes busy preparing for when Duda shows up and causes total chaos in Scots house. With his house in ruins, Scot stays overnight at Dudas house. However, Dudas loud snoring keeps Scot awake all night. Scot hopes to close his eyes after Duda leaves in the morning, but the constant noises outside drive him crazy. The friends plan a surprise party for Scot; Unfortunately, the clueless Scott exploits them and tells them to shut up. Later, Scot goes to look for his friends, but they are nowhere to be found. Scot is sad because he thinks he has alienated his friends. As he walks home alone, he hears his name being called. Its Duda and the others! They surprise you with a special gift.

programme.title: Lets Get Kraken
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Magic Factory – Hansel & Gretel Case 2
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of HANSEL and GRETEL, having been called out by GRETEL. When they arrive, the detective discovers that it has been a year since the witch fell into the oven and the story ended happily. HANSEL and GRETEL’s lives are now happy and prosperous, thanks to the treasure they took from the WITCH. But then GRETEL bought a packet of cakes in which there was an invitation to visit the Magic Factory, a wonderful place full of promises and all kinds of sweet things. Despite his sister’s opposition, HANSEL went to the magic factory. But that was three days ago and HANSEL has still not returned. What mysteries are concealed within that magic factory?

programme.title: Day At The Spa
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want to pamper themselves. Yes!! a complete spa treatment. And when Larry Marly and Charly enter the scene, spa becomes a punishment for Don and Colonel. But when they are at their wits end, the dogs make sure that, the naughty rats learn a lesson. How does the twist happen??

programme.title: The Green Monkey - The Thousand And One Nights
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the exotic world of The Thousand and One Nights, having been called out by the VIZIER of Baghdad. His daughter, SCHEHERAZADE has mysteriously lost her voice, when there is just one more night to go to reach the magic number 1001. If SANDRA and FO don’t manage to solve the case and remedy the problem, SCHEHERAZADE will not be able to tell the last story to the SULTAN and will be executed the next morning

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: The Race
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Basket Bunny
programme.desc: Fred bargains with the girls basketball team to let Brains join the team. In return, he agrees to be team’s bunny mascot, commanding Friday into a pair of super-jumping shoes. His get up proves handy when Brains needs his help capturing a massive space chicken.

programme.title: Me-tal Magnet
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Team Awesome
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Dimsum To Go
programme.desc: A bowl of lip smacking Dimsums and four pair of eyes. Don tries his best to hide it but in vain! Watch Don and the mice chase each other in this quest.

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: Tika Pila Thriller
programme.desc: Bella the mouse is trying hard to balance a huge pile of books just when Mewmew zooms by making Bella trip on a pebble. So she continues walking forward in reverse mode. She is so engrossed in her new walking mode that she bumps into Deedee making her books fall all over the place. On Deedee’s query as to what new learning Bella was into, they start discussing about Tika Pila and their joined curiosity to know more about the secretive creature by asking everybody in Abra-Dabra what they know about Tika Pila. Charlie seems to know a little, but the Doobydoos are too scared to even speak about her. But Bella is determined to know all she can about Tika Pila and sets off all geared for the expedition. She is scared out of her wits by the sudden and loud hooting of Tika Pila she runs for her life and slips to a halt right in front of Deedee and Nino. Almost when Bella is about to give up her Tika Pila discovery project, Deedee encourages her by helping Bella with some magic. Deedee casts a spell to help Bella get close enough to study Tika Pila. Strengthened by the spell, Bella gives one more try. Deedee and friends soon spot Tika Pila at town-hall. But as they admire how wonderful Tika Pila looks as she eats cacti flowers they hear her hoot very differently. Bella opines that the hoots are successively different because Tika Pila wants to go back home. Just then the Doodbydoos pass by and Tika Pila follows them. Deedee comes up with a plan to lure Tika Pila back to her home by getting the Doobydoos to follow Mayor De Pfeffle holding out a plate stacked with their favourite custard sandwiches. Deedee and Bella lay cacti flowers as well for Tika Pila to follow. On seeing the wide open cacti fields Tika Pila gives a loud and happy toot and makes a run for it. Bella is so happy that she decides that something as wonderful, mystical and magical as Tika Pila shouldn’t be studied.

programme.title: Infieles
programme.desc: Un encuentro cercano con la muerte le muestra a Asli que no está lista para dejar de vivir.

programme.title: Infieles
programme.desc: La investigación de la Policía sobre el asesinato de Serkán llega a un final impactante.

programme.title: Manos a la obra
programme.desc: De ingeniero dotado sin fama a una estrella de reparaciones, a Fedor le esperan aventuras y nuevo amor.

programme.title: Manos a la obra
programme.desc: De ingeniero dotado sin fama a una estrella de reparaciones, a Fedor le esperan aventuras y nuevo amor.

programme.title: SuperDad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: SuperDad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.desc: Popeye is trying to get his nephews to eat their spinach, so he tells them about how Hercules (Popeye) defeated a bully (Bluto). Hercules gets his strength by sniffing garlic; he wins numerous tests of strength against the bully until the bully spots him sniffing garlic. programme.title: Boo Moon
programme.desc: Casper emerges from a subway station, following a crowd of scared strangers. He encounters a man saying "see the wonders of the moon for ten cents," and offering a sight through a telescope. Casper scares the man away, then uses the telescope to see the moon. He then flies to the moon for a visit. Casper lands on the moon, disappointed to find no man on the moon. He lies down to nap, then tiny moon men emerge from holes. They capture Casper, like Lilliputians did to Gulliver, then place him in a cage on wheels, in which they tow him to the Ruler of the Moon, King Luna. The King addresses Casper as a monster, and treats him as an enemy. Casper playfully picks up King Luna, and the king has him placed in the royal dungeon. A dejected Casper is imprisoned. Then animated trees attack the city of the moon men. The moon men defend their fortified city with flaming missiles. The tree monsters fight back with water, then break through the town walls. When the fight seems lost to the tree monsters, Casper escapes his cage, and helps the moon men. Casper goes underground. The friendly ghost then pulls trees' parts through the moon surface and ties them together, immobilizing the trees. The frustrated trees writhe and strain against the knots Casper has tied. Casper and the moon men have won. Then, and only then, does King Luna embrace Casper as a friend. King Luna knights Casper for the valiant defense of his people. Then all the moon men join in singing the Casper theme song.

programme.desc:
En este episodio entrevistamos a Ari Global, nacida entre el prestigioso medio de comunicación venezolano "Cisneros Media" ahora dedica su vida al periodismo, la periodista nos cuenta cómo es entrevistar a las celebridades más famosas y cuál cree que sea el secreto de su éxito. Además hablamos de su libro en donde narra en primera persona muchas de estas entrevistas.
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada JUEVES por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: MARAVILLA MARTÍNEZ - CUÁNDO SERÁ SU ÚLTIMA VEZ EN EL RING?
programme.desc:
En nuestro primer episodio hablamos con Maravilla Martínez acerca de su carrera, sus comienzos, su presente, los desafíos atravesados en el camino, las terapias alternativas como las regresiones a vidas pasadas y mucho más!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada JUEVES por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: Concierto Poético de Laura Chimaras: 6 Poemas de Amor y Vida | Música en Vivo | Memorias
STEPHANIE CARRILLO: "La maternidad transformó mi vida" | La generación del Cambio - Episodio 3
programme.desc:
En este episodio tenemos a Stefi Carrillo, quien nos comparte un testimonio conmovedor de resiliencia y lucha. Su maternidad, resultado de un tratamiento de fertilización in vitro, marcó un nuevo capítulo lleno de desafíos y alegrías. Con dos mellizas y una carrera exitosa, Stefi demuestra que con fe, apoyo y determinación, es posible equilibrar sueños profesionales y la vida personal.
Este es un llamado a todas las mujeres para que, con valentía, sigan adelante enfrentando los desafíos, se cuiden y celebren sus logros, porque, como dice Stefi, reconocer nuestro propio valor es parte esencial de ese camino. Roche nos motiva a formar parte de la Generación del Cambio.

programme.title: MELINA VICARIO: “No existe cura sin el miedo al diagnóstico” | La generación del Cambio - Episodio 4
programme.desc:
En el último episodio de Agente del Cambio, Meli Vicario nos regala una poderosa lección de vida, compartiendo su historia de lucha, esperanza y superación. Nos recuerda la importancia de escuchar nuestro cuerpo, de nunca rendirnos y de ser tenaces cuando buscamos respuestas para nuestra salud y nuestra vida.
A través de su experiencia, Meli hace un llamado a todas las personas, y nos recuerda que, aunque los diagnósticos pueden ser difíciles y los caminos inciertos, nunca debemos dejar de buscar respuestas ni permitir que nuestra voz se apague.
Roche, nos motiva a formar parte de la Generación del Cambio, un movimiento que invita a levantar la voz, compartir nuestras historias, y luchar por una atención médica más equitativa y accesible para todos.
